summary: Successfully verified MongoDB ObjectId serialization fix. All backend APIs now working 100% (28/28 tests passed). Frontend displays correctly with proper authentication flow, business types, and responsive design. All specified coordinate requests working correctly.

working_endpoints: /api/plots/coords/0/0 - Returns edge plot with 10.0 TON price ✅
/api/plots/coords/50/50 - Returns center plot with 100.0 TON price ✅
/api/plots/coords/99/99 - Returns corner plot with 11.8 TON price ✅

passed_tests: MongoDB ObjectId serialization fix verified - all coordinate requests working
Multiple plot coordinate requests (0,0), (50,50), (99,99) working correctly
Price calculation verified: center=100 TON, edge=10 TON, corner=11.8 TON
Auth flow /api/auth/verify-wallet creates user and returns token
/api/businesses/types returns all 6 business types (farm, factory, shop, power_plant, bank, restaurant)
/api/stats returns correct statistics with all required fields
Frontend landing page displays correctly with title and sections
Frontend shows business types with prices (6 types with icons and costs)
Game statistics display working (players, plots, businesses, volume)
Responsive design adapts correctly to mobile viewport
Authentication flow shows correct message when wallet not connected
All business icons and prices displayed correctly
Features section and economy explanation present
